text: Sheperd Crest is a ridge, in the northern part of Yosemite National Park. Notably, Sheperd Crest divides into Shepherd Crest East and Shepherd Crest West. Shephard's Crest is between North Peak and Excelsior Mountain. Mount Conness is near. Mount Warren is near, and Mono Lake is just east. Tuolumne Meadows is south. ==On climbing Shepard Crest== Shepard Crest has climbs, from scrambles to a rock climb. ==References== ==External links and references== * Much information, on Shepard Crest Category:Mountains of Yosemite National Park Category:Landforms of Yosemite National Park
title: Sheperd Crest (Yosemite)
